alert.note: Alert for Cowlitz (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 06 at 10:56AM PST until December 06 at 11:32PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oregon...Washington... Wilson River near Tillamook affecting Tillamook County. Siletz River at Siletz affecting Lincoln County. Cowlitz River at Kelso affecting Cowlitz County. Grays River at Covered Bridge near Rosburg affecting Wahkiakum County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Cowlitz River at Kelso. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...Above 21.5 feet, expect flooding of several low lying and secondary roads, including the Cowlitz Gardens neighborhood, along with flooding of pasture and lowland upstream of Kelso. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:36 AM PST Wednesday the stage was 22.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 18.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:36 AM PST Wednesday was 22.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will crest late this morning around 22.0 feet. It will fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 21.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 430 PM PST.
